views.markdown:
iOS 10 Support iOS9 Support
Groups sorted alphabetically
iPhone 6 / 6 Plus support iOS7 support - fixed a bug while sorting the contacts Improvements and fixes

- Ability to turn vibration for the group off

- iPhone 5 support
- iPad support
Fixed some texttones not assigning as ringtones iOS 5.1.x support Minor fixes

Exchange contacts no longer appear in the members view.
After creating a group the textfiled returns to "Create Group" - Support for custom tones manually added to /Library/Ringtones (texttones must be under 30 seconds)
- Tones with no artist name will show "#" instead of ""
- App will alert if trying to assign/clear an empty group
